content:
Can I ask for a quick review of this? It moves the definition of additive characters from NumberTheory/LegendreSymbol to somewhere higher up the algebra hierarchy (since these are getting used in lots of other places now, e.g. LeanAPAP).

If someone could take a look at the dependent PR #11313, then that would also be appreciated (but that actually adds new code so will not be quite as quick to review).
